rows.label: qev090602_MSG0001
rows.name: Oh! Er... Are you BLADEs?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0002
rows.name: Who are you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0003
rows.name: I am Prone of Tree Clan. I am no enemy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0004
rows.name: Oh? Then why are you here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0005
rows.name:
Ganglion took my family.
Holding them prisoner up ahead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0006
rows.name:
Please. Stop them.
Save my family before they die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0007
rows.name:
Sorry. We're in the middle of a job.
Go ask your xeno friends for help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0008
rows.name: Let's move out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0009
rows.name: Looking at this thing just dredges up memories of Clarissa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0010
rows.name:
Let's go hunt the monster we came for
and reclaim the good name of the Harriers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_JNK0010
rows.name: Aid

rows.label: qev090602_SEL0011
rows.name: Insist that you help the Prone.

rows.label: qev090602_JNK0020
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev090602_SEL0021
rows.name: Ignore the Prone and move on.

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0011
rows.name:
Did you forget the sound of Clarissa's screams
when she was killed in cold blood?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0012
rows.name:
All Prone share responsibility for this act,
no matter which clan they claim.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0013
rows.name: And yet you want me to help this...thing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0014
rows.name: Mmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0015
rows.name: You wish me to hold back my anger? To forgo my hatred? [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0016
rows.name:
...I understand. Allowing the Ganglion to kill again
would put me on equal footing with them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0017
rows.name:
I'll never forget how Clarissa screamed as they killed her.
And I will never forgive it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0018
rows.name: No! Please help me... You must![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0019
rows.name:
They took my daughter...
She is baby. Only just born.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0020
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0021
rows.name:
Grrragh! Those animals. Even the life
of a child is but mere sport to them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0022
rows.name:
If we walk away from this, something important
in ourselves may die along with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0023
rows.name:
...Very well, xeno. I will swallow my hatred
and save your innocent family's lives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0024
rows.name: Thank you. Please hurry. Please save my family.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0025
rows.name: Ganglion troops are camping just ahead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0026
rows.name:
Thank you. Ganglion are camping just ahead.
Please hurry. Please hurry andâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0027
rows.name: Huh? What's this light?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0028
rows.name: Nggh... HOW?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0029
rows.name:
How do mere humans possess a
jamming device of this magnitude?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0030
rows.name: This... It's the transmitter that Ma-non we rescued gave us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0031
rows.name: Curse those meddling little worms and their blasted technology![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0032
rows.name:
Bah! You've wasted my perfect performance
AND my precious time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_JNK0030
rows.name: Interrogate

rows.label: qev090602_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask the stranger who she is and what she wants.

rows.label: qev090602_JNK0040
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev090602_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask what the hell just happened.

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0033
rows.name:
Are you so curious about me, primitives?
Then I will tell you a secret.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0034
rows.name: You will die here, writhing in pain after unimaginable torture.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0035
rows.name: It was your doing, not mine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0036
rows.name: The work of that miserable little Ma-non toy you carry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0037
rows.name:
But no matter. Now that the performance is over,
the curtain shall drop on you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0038
rows.name: Welcome your death, primitives![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0039
rows.name:
No Ma-non trinket can save you
from the painful end that awaits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090602_MSG0040
rows.name:
Ganglion are still ahead.
Please save my family![ST:wait ]
